product_description: A StackOverflow-like platform for AI coders to share/troubleshoot issues. MVP focuses on core Q&A flow with mock auth and seamless sharing.
user_flows: User posts an AI coding issue (title, description, error code, screenshot)
User browses/search issues without logging in
User shares issue thread via URL
tech_stack: Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind, shadcn-ui, Zustand, Zod, Supabase (mock)
